fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
This Tinsect **cannot** be played on the play pile (it wants to eat dead cards lol).
- Once played on the discard pile, every turn taken, the card below it is **Banished** instead of being sent to the discard pile.
- Once this eats a card that it could be played on, have the effect of that card go to the current player's turn.
- If this reaches the bottom of the discard pile, this card is **Banished**.

fields.name: - Flipped (only If 4th Case) ( <:grave:1119394182310670366> + <:tinsect:1172249217272643604> + <:pink:1106716301843497030> ):
fields.value: Same as above except the effect is doubled.
